name: About Love
description:
This game is made for LD41.

LOVE + TD + CLICK.

Unlike traditional Tower Defense games, you need to kill all incomg enemys.

In this game,the piece of your love keep coming out.

Those love piece are send  by you to your lover(boy or girl),the love piece will fade during the transmission.

You must keep click the Love Piece to ensure your love will into your lover's heart.

Hope you enjoy!

It's all about LOVE.

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

HOW TO PLAY

Click Those moving pieces to ensure it can go through your lover's heart.
The love health bar on the TOP is your goal.If you reach the point,you beat the game.

As the love point rising, you can use addtional bonus skill to power up your love piece.

This game contains 5 chapter. Hope you enjoy!
